 24/// Binary expression block type.
 25///
 26/// Template parameters:
 27///   :Operation: Binary operation. Parametrized on value-type
 28///    for elementwise operation, or on block otherwise.
 29///   :LBlock: The first argument block.
 30///   :RBlock: The second argument block.
 31///   :Elementwise: True if this is an elementwise operation.
 32template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
 33	  typename LBlock,
 34	  typename RBlock,
 35	  bool Elementwise = false>
 36class Binary;
 37
 38/// Binary expression block specialization for elementwise operations.
 39template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
 40	  typename LBlock, typename RBlock>
 41class Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, true> : impl::Non_assignable
 42{
 43  typedef Operation<typename LBlock::value_type, typename RBlock::value_type>
 44  operation_type;
 45public:
 46  static dimension_type const dim = LBlock::dim;
 47  typedef typename operation_type::result_type value_type;
 48  typedef value_type &reference_type;
 49  typedef value_type const &const_reference_type;
 50  typedef typename LBlock::map_type map_type;
 51
 52  Binary(LBlock const &lhs, RBlock const &rhs)
 53    : lhs_(lhs), rhs_(rhs) 
 54  {
 55//     assert(!Is_sized_block<LBlock>::value ||
 56// 	   !Is_sized_block<RBlock>::value ||
 57// 	   extent<dim>(lhs_) == extent<dim>(rhs_));
 58  }
 59  Binary(operation_type const &op, LBlock const &lhs, RBlock const &rhs)
 60    : operation_(op), lhs_(lhs), rhs_(rhs) 
 61  {
 62//     assert(!Is_sized_block<LBlock>::value ||
 63// 	   !Is_sized_block<RBlock>::value ||
 64// 	   extent<dim>(lhs_) == extent<dim>(rhs_));
 65  }
 66
 67  length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW
 68  {
 69    if (!impl::Is_sized_block<LBlock>::value) return rhs_.size();
 70    else if (!impl::Is_sized_block<RBlock>::value) return lhs_.size();
 71    else return lhs_.size(); 
 72  }
 73  length_type size(dimension_type Dim, dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW
 74  {
 75    if (!impl::Is_sized_block<LBlock>::value) return rhs_.size(Dim, d); 
 76    else if (!impl::Is_sized_block<RBlock>::value) return lhs_.size(Dim, d); 
 77    else return lhs_.size(Dim, d); 
 78  }
 79
 80  void increment_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
 81  void decrement_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
 82  map_type const &map() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return lhs_.map();}
 83
 84  operation_type const &operation() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return operation_;}
 85  LBlock const &arg1() const VSIP_NOTHROW {return lhs_;}
 86  RBlock const &arg2() const VSIP_NOTHROW {return rhs_;}
 87
 88  value_type get(index_type i) const
 89  {
 90    return operation()(this->arg1().get(i),
 91		       this->arg2().get(i));
 92  }
 93  value_type get(index_type i, index_type j) const
 94  {
 95    return operation()(this->arg1().get(i, j),
 96		       this->arg2().get(i, j));
 97  }
 98  value_type get(index_type i, index_type j, index_type k) const
 99  {
100    return operation()(this->arg1().get(i, j, k),
101		       this->arg2().get(i, j, k));
102  }
103
104private:
105  operation_type operation_;
106  typename impl::View_block_storage<LBlock>::expr_type lhs_;
107  typename impl::View_block_storage<RBlock>::expr_type rhs_;
108};
109
110/// Binary expression block specialization for non-elementwise operations.
111template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
112	  typename LBlock, typename RBlock>
113class Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, false> : impl::Non_assignable
114{
115  typedef Operation<LBlock, RBlock> operation_type;
116  typedef Dense<operation_type::dim, typename operation_type::result_type>
117  cache_type;
118public:
119  typedef typename operation_type::map_type map_type;
120  typedef typename operation_type::result_type value_type;
121  static dimension_type const dim = operation_type::dim;
122
123  Binary(operation_type const &op) : operation_(op) {}
124  Binary(Binary const &b) : operation_(b.operation_) {}
125
126  length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return operation_.size();}
127  length_type size(dimension_type block_dim, dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW
128  { return operation_.size(block_dim, d);}
129  void increment_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
130  void decrement_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
131  map_type const &map() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return operation_.map();}
132
133  operation_type const &operation() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return operation_;}
134  LBlock const &arg1() const VSIP_NOTHROW {return operation_.arg1();}
135  RBlock const &arg2() const VSIP_NOTHROW {return operation_.arg2();}
136
137  value_type get(index_type i) const
138  { 
139    assert(cache_.get());
140    return cache_->get(i);
141  }
142  value_type get(index_type i, index_type j) const
143  { 
144    assert(cache_.get());
145    return cache_->get(i, j);
146  }
147  value_type get(index_type i, index_type j, index_type k) const
148  { 
149    assert(cache_.get());
150    return cache_->get(i, j, k);
151  }
152
153  /// Evaluate the operation to make this type usable as an ordinary block.
154  void evaluate() const
155  {
156    if (!cache_.get())
157    {
158      cache_.reset(new cache_type(impl::block_domain<dim>(operation_)));
159      operation_.apply(*(cache_.get()));
160    }
161  }
162  /// Evaluate the operation into the given result block.
163  template <typename ResultBlock>
164  void apply(ResultBlock &result) const
165  {
166    // If this expression was already evaluated,
167    // just copy the cached result.
168    if (cache_.get()) impl::assign<dim>(result, *cache_);
169    else operation_.apply(result);
170  }
171
172private:
173  operation_type operation_;
174  mutable std::auto_ptr<cache_type> cache_;
175};
176
177} // namespace vsip_csl::expr
178} // namespace vsip_csl

185/// Specialize Is_expr_block for binary expr blocks.
186template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
187	  typename LBlock,
188	  typename RBlock,
189	  bool Elementwise>
190struct Is_expr_block<expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, Elementwise> >
191{ static bool const value = true; };
192
193/// Specialize View_block_storage to control how views store binary
194/// expression blocks.
195template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
196	  typename LBlock,
197	  typename RBlock,
198	  bool Elementwise>
199struct View_block_storage<expr::Binary<Operation,
200				 LBlock,
201				 RBlock,
202				 Elementwise> const>
203  : By_value_block_storage<expr::Binary<Operation,
204					LBlock,
205					RBlock,
206					Elementwise> const>
207{
208};
209
210template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
211	  typename LBlock,
212	  typename RBlock,
213	  bool Elementwise>
214struct View_block_storage<expr::Binary<Operation,
215				       LBlock,
216				       RBlock, Elementwise> >
217{
218  // No typedef provided.  A non-const expresstion template block is
219  // an error.
220};
221
222template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
223	  typename LBlock,
224	  typename RBlock,
225	  bool Elementwise>
226struct Distributed_local_block<
227  expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, Elementwise> const>
228{
229  typedef expr::Binary<Operation,
230		       typename Distributed_local_block<LBlock>::type,
231		       typename Distributed_local_block<RBlock>::type,
232		       Elementwise> const
233  type;
234  typedef expr::Binary<Operation,
235		       typename Distributed_local_block<LBlock>::proxy_type,
236		       typename Distributed_local_block<RBlock>::proxy_type,
237		       Elementwise> const
238  proxy_type;
239};
240
241template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
242	  typename LBlock,
243	  typename RBlock,
244	  bool Elementwise>
245struct Distributed_local_block<
246  expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, Elementwise> >
247{
248  typedef expr::Binary<Operation,
249		       typename Distributed_local_block<LBlock>::type,
250		       typename Distributed_local_block<RBlock>::type,
251		       Elementwise>
252  type;
253  typedef expr::Binary<Operation,
254		       typename Distributed_local_block<LBlock>::proxy_type,
255		       typename Distributed_local_block<RBlock>::proxy_type,
256		       Elementwise>
257  proxy_type;
258};
259
260template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
261	  typename Arg1, typename Arg2>
262expr::Binary<Operation,
263	     typename Distributed_local_block<Arg1>::type,
264	     typename Distributed_local_block<Arg2>::type,
265	     true>
266get_local_block(expr::Binary<Operation, Arg1, Arg2, true> const &block)
267{
268  typedef expr::Binary<Operation,
269    typename Distributed_local_block<Arg1>::type,
270    typename Distributed_local_block<Arg2>::type, true>
271    block_type;
272
273  return block_type(get_local_block(block.arg1()),
274		    get_local_block(block.arg2()));
275}
276
277template <template <typename, typename> class Operation,
278	  typename Arg1, typename Arg2>
279expr::Binary<Operation,
280	     typename Distributed_local_block<Arg1>::type,
281	     typename Distributed_local_block<Arg2>::type,
282	     false>
283get_local_block(expr::Binary<Operation, Arg1, Arg2, false> const &block)
284{
285  typedef expr::Binary<Operation,
286    typename Distributed_local_block<Arg1>::type,
287    typename Distributed_local_block<Arg2>::type, false>
288    block_type;
289  typename Operation<Arg1, Arg2>::local_type 
290    local_operation(block.operation().local());
291  block_type local_block(local_operation);
292  return local_block;
293}
294
295template <typename CombineT,
296	  template <typename, typename> class Operation,
297	  typename LBlock,
298	  typename RBlock,
299	  bool Elementwise>
300struct Combine_return_type<CombineT,
301			   expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, Elementwise> const>
302{
303  typedef expr::Binary<Operation,
304		typename Combine_return_type<CombineT, LBlock>::tree_type,
305		typename Combine_return_type<CombineT, RBlock>::tree_type,
306		Elementwise> const tree_type;
307  typedef tree_type type;
308};
309
310template <typename CombineT,
311	  template <typename, typename> class Operation,
312	  typename LBlock,
313	  typename RBlock,
314	  bool Elementwise>
315struct Combine_return_type<CombineT,
316			   expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, Elementwise> >
317: Combine_return_type<CombineT,
318		      expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, Elementwise> const>
319{};
320
321template <typename CombineT,
322	  template <typename, typename> class Operation,
323	  typename LBlock,
324	  typename RBlock,
325	  bool Elementwise>
326typename Combine_return_type<CombineT,
327			     expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, Elementwise> const>::type
328apply_combine(CombineT const&                                                     combine,
329	      expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, Elementwise> const &block)
330{
331  typedef typename Combine_return_type<
332    CombineT, expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, Elementwise> const>::type
333    block_type;
334
335  return block_type(apply_combine(combine, block.arg1()),
336		    apply_combine(combine, block.arg2()));
337}
338
339template <typename                            VisitorT,
340	  template <typename, typename> class Operation,
341	  typename                            LBlock,
342	  typename                            RBlock,
343	  bool Elementwise>
344void
345apply_leaf(VisitorT const &visitor,
346	   expr::Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, Elementwise> const& block)
347{
348  apply_leaf(visitor, block.arg1());
349  apply_leaf(visitor, block.arg2());
350}

354template <dimension_type D,
355	  typename M,
356	  template <typename, typename> class O,
357	  typename B1,
358	  typename B2>
359struct Is_par_same_map<D, M, expr::Binary<O, B1, B2, true> const>
360{
361  typedef expr::Binary<O, B1, B2, true> const block_type;
362
363  static bool value(M const &map, block_type &block)
364  {
365    return Is_par_same_map<D, M, B1>::value(map, block.arg1()) &&
366           Is_par_same_map<D, M, B2>::value(map, block.arg2());
367  }
368};
369
370template <dimension_type D,
371	  typename M,
372	  template <typename, typename> class O,
373	  typename B1,
374	  typename B2>
375struct Is_par_same_map<D, M, expr::Binary<O, B1, B2, false> const>
376{
377  typedef expr::Binary<O, B1, B2, false> const block_type;
378
379  static bool value(M const &map, block_type &block)
380  {
381    return Is_par_same_map<D, M, O<B1, B2> >::value(map, block.operation());
382  }
383};
384
385template <template <typename, typename> class O,
386	  typename B1,
387	  typename B2>
388struct Is_par_reorg_ok<expr::Binary<O, B1, B2, true> const>
389{
390  static bool const value = Is_par_reorg_ok<B1>::value &&
391                            Is_par_reorg_ok<B2>::value;
392};
393
394template <template <typename, typename> class O,
395	  typename B1,
396	  typename B2>
397struct Is_par_reorg_ok<expr::Binary<O, B1, B2, false> const>
398{
399  static bool const value = false;
400};
